pageContext.claim: “You haven't had a missile test [by North Korea] in seven months. You haven't had a firing. You haven't had a nuclear test in eight and a half months. You haven't had missiles flying over Japan. He gave us the remains of our great heroes.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump indicates North Korea has let up its nuclear activities since he and Kim Jong Un signed a vague joint statement on denuclearization June 12. But experts say and satellite imagery indicates that North Korea continues to pursue a nuclear program. Remains of U.S. soldiers from the Korean War had not been returned by Kim when Trump said this.
